cards.title: Rockstar
powers: {Rockstar} deals 1 target 2 melee damage. Until the start of your next turn, increase HP recovery by {Rockstar} by 1.
incapacitatedAbilities: Increase HP Recovery by Heroes by 1 until the start of your next turn.
Select one Target. Reduce damage dealt by that Target by 1 until the start of your next turn.
Reduce damage to Hero Targets from environment cards by 1 until the start of your next turn.

openingLines.default: Now playing: The Hammer's greatest hits!

cards.title: Front Woman
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Stage Presence cards in play.
Reduce damage dealt  to {Rockstar} by Villain Character Cards by 1.
Any time a non-Hero card would deal damage to the Hero target with the highest HP, you may redirect that damage to {Rockstar}

flavorQuotes.text: I'll keep the big guy occupied.{BR}You deal with the bugs.

cards.title: Play to the Crowd
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Stage Presence cards in play.
Reduce Melee and Projectile Damage dealt to {Rockstar} by 1.
Whenever a Non-Hero card would deal damage to the Hero Target with the lowest HP, or any Target with 3 or fewer HP, you may redirect that damage to {Rockstar}.

flavorQuotes.text: I'll be your angel on call,{BR}I'll be on demand.

cards.title: Own the Stage
body: When this card enters play, destroy all other Stage Presence cards in play.
Reduce damage to {Rockstar} from the environment by 2.
You may redirect damage from the environment to {Rockstar}.

flavorQuotes.text: All in all,{BR}I'm just another brick in the wall.

cards.title: Intermission
body: {Rockstar} gains 2 HP. Search your deck or your trash for a Stage Presence card and put it into play or into your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: So if the world should end tonight,{BR}I had a crazy, classic life.

cards.title: Confident
body: The first time each turn that one of {Rockstar}'s cards is destroyed, she may play a card.
The first time each turn that {Rockstar} is forced to discard, she may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: Cause this is my ground,{BR}and I'm dangerous.

cards.title: Wicked Solo
powers: {Rockstar} deals one target 2 melee damage. If a target takes damage this way, redirect all damage dealt by that target to {Rockstar} and reduce damage dealt by that target by 1 until the start of your next turn.

flavorQuotes.text: Shut up and dance with me.

cards.title: Standing Ovation
body: When a Non-Hero Target is destroyed outside of {Rockstar}'s turn, {Rockstar} may draw a card.

cards.title: Power Chord
body: Deal 1 Target Melee or Projectile Damage equal to the number of unique Ongoings {Rockstar} has in play, plus 2.

cards.title: Starter Guitar
body: This card is Indestructible. It remains a valid target against effects which would destroy Equipment Cards.
powers: Deal 1 Target 1 Sonic and 1 Melee Damage. Until the start of your Next turn treat this card as a 1 HP Hero Target.

flavorQuotes.text: Super-strength, and learning to play...{BR}Have you seen what she puts that thing through?

cards.title: Diva
body: Non-Hero cards cannot prevent {Rockstar} from using Powers.
The first time per turn, outside of her own, a card allows {Rockstar} to play a card or use a power , {Rockstar} may first destroy an Ongoing, Device, or Environment Card.

cards.title: I Am Titanium
body: Reduce damage dealt to {Rockstar} by 1.
When {Rockstar} is dealt Melee or Projectile Damage, she may deal 1 damage of that type to one Non-Hero Target.

cards.title: Wrecking Ball
body: Deal {Rockstar} 2 Irreducible Fire Damage. You may destroy up to 3 Ongoing or Environment Cards.
{Rockstar} may deal one Target Melee Damage equal to the number of cards destroyed this turn.

flavorQuotes.text: I came in like a wrecking ball!

cards.title: Roar
body: Non-Hero Cards cannot prevent {Rockstar} from playing cards.
The first time each turn that {Rockstar} destroys a Non-Hero card she may deal 1 Target 2 Melee Damage and gain 1 HP.

flavorQuotes.text: You hear my voice,{BR}you hear that sound.{BR}Like thunder gonna shake the ground.

cards.title: Shake It Off
body: When {Rockstar} would take 3 or more damage you may destroy this card. If you do, prevent that damage and you may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: It's like I've got this music in my mind,{BR}saying it's gonna be all right.

cards.title: Ballroom Blitz
body: Destroy an Environment Card. Select a Villain Deck. Until the start of {Rockstar}'s next turn, the target deck may not play cards.
The Villain target with the highest HP deals Rockstar 3 Irreducible Projectile Damage.

flavorQuotes.text: I see a man in the back,{BR}as a matter of fact.{BR}His eyes are as red as the sun.

cards.title: So What?
body: Whenever exactly 1 Damage would be dealt to {Rockstar}, prevent that damage.
powers: {Rockstar} gains 2 HP and may draw a card.

flavorQuotes.text: I got my rock moves,{BR}and I don't need you.

cards.title: Encore
body: {Rockstar} gains 2 HP. You may take an Ongoing from your Trash and put it on top of your deck.

flavorQuotes.text: That's right, we're Daybreak.{BR}We're Awe – what's that, the shop?{BR}Contact the Freedom Five.{BR}They'll take care of it.

cards.title: Hit Me Baby
body: When this card enters play, {Rockstar} gains 2 HP.
The first time per turn outside of her own that another Hero allows {Rockstar} to Use a Power or Play a Card, she may first Play a Card.
cards.flavorText: oO(I knew you had it in you.)

cards.title: Blonde Ambition
body: Deal one Target 2 Melee damage. Deal a second target 2 Projectile Damage. Non-character-card targets dealt damage this way may not use any End of Turn abilities until the start of {Rockstar}'s next turn.

promoCards.title: Rockstar
powers: Reduce damage redirected to {Rockstar} by 1 until the start of your next turn. Gain 2 HP.
incapacitatedAbilities: Up to 3 Hero Targets may gain 1 HP.
Each Player may shuffle a card from their trash into their deck.
Treat this card as a 1 HP, Indestructible Hero Target until the start of your next turn.

openingLines.default: Follow my lead, guys. We will, we will Rock You!
